name: mt5-optimizer-analyzer
description: Analisador de otimização MT5 - Encontre o menor drawdown com maior lucro

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp -r *.html *.js *.css *.json *.xml public/ || (md public 2>nul & copy *.html public\ & copy *.js public\ & copy *.css public\ & copy *.json public\ & copy *.xml public\)

author: MT5 Analyzer Team
